duties_responsibilities.duty: Define and develop build projects, including job definitions, network integration, connection prints, and path planning review.
Oversee projects from concept to completion, driving all phases of construction, including scheduling, budgets, and resource management.
Complete job site walkouts, facilitate project meetings, and meet deadlines with a high level of quality.
Utilize network and asset knowledge for Aerial & Underground assets, and develop Project Packet with project detail, maps, images, and supporting files.
Support the design team with project detail, images, and additional research and resource materials.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Telecommunications, Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
